title: Develop Brand Voice Guidelines
description: A brand manager needs to create a document that defines the brand's voice and tone for all marketing communications.

tasks.description: Analyze existing company content to identify current voice characteristics.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews past ads, blog posts, and social media content.

tasks.description: Define key brand voice attributes (e.g., 'Playful, but not childish', 'Helpful, but not condescending').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a list of 3-5 core voice attributes.

tasks.description: Create a document with 'do's and don'ts' and examples of on-brand and off-brand copy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a clear, practical guide for writers and marketers to follow.
